short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create tasks from wherever you want!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
GipsyBot is a cute bot that’s helps you achieve more. This little browser extension helps transform your email from a todo list from the world to you, to a to do list from you to the world. In just a few clicks you can assign tasks to yourself and others and most importantly find out when they will be done. 

We’re currently in beta - we only roll out invites as our product gets ready for the world. Once we do, we hope you will enjoy this cute bot as much as we do. 

In the meantime feel free to request an invite and we’ll keep you updated with our progress
